attributes.action: Make Gender Neutral Toilets a legal requirement in all public areas
attributes.additional_details: With everything going on in the news at the moment with trans laws, I want everyone to feel inclusive and comfortable using restrooms around the country. As a trans person myself, I want every trans person to feel comfortable going to the bathroom, without worrying about hate crimes or being subject to misgendering. This is very important to myself and other people in the LGBTQ+ community.
attributes.background: I want the government to require ender neutral toilets to be provided in public spaces around the UK, including education institutions and shopping outlets.
